content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <metadata record="784"><idinfo><citation><citeinfo><origin role="Sponsor">Wyoming Water Science Center</origin><title>Wyoming drought watch</title><pubinfo><publish>U.S. Geological Survey</publish></pubinfo><onlink>http://wy.water.usgs.gov/projects/drought/</onlink></citeinfo></citation><descript><abstract>Gives map of streamflow conditions in Wyoming with access to streamflow data, real-time, daily and historic, plus information on drought analysis and management.</abstract></descript><accconst>none</accconst><useconst>none</useconst><keywords><place><placekt>Common geographic areas</placekt><placekey>fUS56 = Wyoming</placekey></place><theme><themekt>USGS Thesaurus</themekt><themekey>droughts</themekey><themekey>hydrographic datasets</themekey><themekey>hydrology</themekey><themekey>natural resource management</themekey><themekey>stream-gage measurement</themekey></theme></keywords><ptcontac><cntinfo><cntemail>scrobert</cntemail></cntinfo></ptcontac></idinfo><metainfo><metd>20120905</metd><metstdn>Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata</metstdn><metstdv>FGDC-STD-001-1998</metstdv></metainfo></metadata>
